alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cameron, southeastern Jefferson Davis, southwestern Acadia, southeastern Calcasieu and northern Vermilion Parishes through 730 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hacketts Corner to Thornwell to near Riceville to near Kaplan to Erath. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Kaplan, Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Hayes, Klondike, Erath, Delcambre, Morse, Riceville, Meaux, Hacketts Corner, Esther, Wright, Thornwell, Lowry, Sweet Lake, Lyons Point and Gibbstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lower Vermilion; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion
